title: World Leaders Respond To Mass Shooting At Australia's Bondi Beach | 10 News
description: The terror attack here at Bondi has sent shockwaves around the world, with international leaders expressing their horror and grief and condemning the mass shooting. King Charles and US President Donald Trump have been among those offering their condolences to the victims, as several countries bolstered their security measures around Jewish communities and events. title: Sydney Reacts To Bondi Terror Attack | 10 News+
description: Sydney is reeling after a terror attack unfolded at Bondi Beach on Sunday. Fifteen people, were killed by two gunmen who targeted a Hanukkah celebration.  In this special episode of 10 News+, we investigate the motive of the gunmen, praise the courage of a hero bystander, talk to witnesses and the loved ones of victims, and examine how community leaders and politicians have reacted. title: Bondi Terror Attack Aftermath, Shooters & Victims Identified, Hero Bystander In Hospital | 10 News+
description: Sydney is reeling after an antisemitic terror attack unfolded at Bondi Beach on Sunday. Fifteen people, aged between 10 and 87, were killed by two gunmen who targeted a Hanukkah celebration. At least 40 others were injured, with 33 people remaining in hospital.   In this special episode of 10 News+, we investigate the motive of the gunmen, praise the courage of a hero bystander, talk to witnesses and the loved ones of victims, and examine how community leaders and politicians have reacted. description: Sydney is reeling after a terror attack unfolded at Bondi Beach on Sunday. Fifteen people, aged between 10 and 87, were killed by two gunmen who targeted a Hanukkah celebration. title: What We Know About The Father & Son Behind The Bondi Beach Shooting | 10 News+
description: Father and son Sajid and Naveed Akram, who lived in the Western Sydney suburb of Bonnyrigg, are the gunmen behind Australia’s worst mass shooting since the Port Arthur massacre in 1996. 50-year-old Sajid was shot dead by police at the scene, while 24-year-old Naveed is in hospital in a critical condition. 10 News+ investigates the background of the two suspects and what drove them to commit the antisemitic terror attack on Bondi Beach, which left at least 15 people dead. title: Witness Describes Protecting Son During Bondi Beach Shooting | 10 News+
description: Vladimir Kotlyar, a Jewish community chaplain, spoke to 10 News+ about the scenes of carnage on Bondi Beach when gunmen began their terror attack targeting a Hanukkah celebration. He choked up when recalling how he lay on top of his 8-year-old son to protect him, feeling helpless as bodies fell around him. title: Israeli PM Netanyahu Blames Anthony Albanese For Antisemitic Terror Attack At Bondi Beach | 10 News+
description: The terror attack on Bondi Beach has put Australia, and its leadership, under a global spotlight. Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has slammed his Australian counterpart, blaming Anthony Albanese for “promoting and encouraging antisemitism”. Other global leaders have also commented on the shooting, including King Charles, US President Donald Trump, and France’s Emmanuel Macron. title: Special Envoy Calls For More Education To Combat Antisemitism After Bondi Beach Shooting | 10 News+
description: Jillian Segal, Australia’s Special Envoy to Combat Antisemitism, is calling for widespread education to counter radicalisation, saying that she will push the government to implement her plan “in an accelerated fashion”. She says the current security funding and legal frameworks are not enough to stop violence against the Jewish community. title: Australia To Reform & Strengthen Gun Laws Following Bondi Shooting | 10 News+
description: Australia’s Prime Minister Anthony Albanese says the National Cabinet has agreed that “strong, decisive and focused action was needed on gun law reform as an immediate action”, in the wake of the Bondi Beach shooting in which two gunmen took the lives of at least 15 people at a Hanukkah celebration. 10 News+ spoke to Stephen Bendle, a gun control advocate, about what he thinks needs to change in Australia. title: Bondi Beach Shooting : What We Know About The Attack That Shocked The World | 10 News
description: It was one of Australia's darkest days, and tonight we now know more about the individuals behind the Bondi Beach terror attack. Including that this calculated plot was carried out, with legally owned weapons. Leaders from across the country have vowed - just like after Port Arthur, our nations gun laws will change. title: Bondi Beach Shooting: Australia Reacts To Deadly Act Of Terrorism | 10’s Late News
description: Tonight on 10’s Late News – special coverage of the Bondi Beach shooting, which has left 15 innocent people dead and dozens more in hospital.  In response, the government has vowed to change the gun laws that allowed the perpetrators to buy the six guns which were used to carry out the attack.
